channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL, CFB Weekend Betting Recap: 'Let's Call it a Break-Even Day'
item.description: Sportsbooks broke even on NFL Week 8, while the public got what it needed in CFB Week 9. Patrick Everson breaks down the weekend's betting action.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 9: Lines, Spreads for all 14 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for all 14 games during Week 9 of the NFL season.

item.title: 'It Can Be a Special Year': Watch out, NFL, the Chiefs' Explosive Offense Is Back
item.description: As the Chiefs host the Commanders on Monday, Patrick Mahomes & Co. are lighting up opponents with their most explosive offense in years.

item.title: 2025 World Series Odds: Dodgers Become Larger Favorite as Series Shifts to L.A.
item.description: Two teams remain. Find out who is favored to win the Fall Classic now that the World Series is underway.

item.title: Olivia Moultrie Scores 2 goals in 3-1 USWNT Victory Over Portugal
item.description: Olivia Moultrie scored two goals and the U.S. womenâ€™s national team bounced back against Portugal with a 3-1 victory on Sunday, after honoring former ...

item.title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 9: Vandy's in the field!
item.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country at this point.

item.title: Week 8 winners and losers: Taylor and Cook deliver; CMC and Robinson fall flat
item.description: Jonathan Taylor, James Cook III and Saquon Barkley led the way with big Week 8 performances, while Christian McCaffrey, Bijan Robinson and Caleb Willi...

item.title: Justin Fields won't get benched? Myles Garrett is DPOY? Let's overreact to Week 8
item.description: We sized up Week 8 overreactions, including fantasy. Is Fields on more solid ground? Will Garrett be the DPOY?

item.title: How the matchups line up for all 46 postseason games
item.description: Even with fewer major upsets this weekend, the bowl picture continues to evolve.

item.title: Buzz: Who got the ball, who got shut out on Sunday
item.description: Knowing who got the ball and how is as important as the fantasy points that were (and weren't) put up on Sunday.
